languages.text: "Память подводит меня: я потеряла сознание вскоре после того, как нас заволокли в тени. Я пришла в себя на грязной арене — против меня выставили какую-то когтистую тварь. Когда я сразила ее — еще одну. Я убивала их — одну за другой, а невидимые зрители требовали еще и еще!"

traits.locale_text: "Память подводит меня: я потеряла сознание вскоре после того, как нас заволокли в тени. Я пришла в себя на грязной арене — против меня выставили какую-то когтистую тварь. Когда я сразила ее — еще одну. Я убивала их — одну за другой, а невидимые зрители требовали еще и еще!"

languages.text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"
languages.original_text: "Память подводит меня: я потеряла сознание вскоре после того, как нас заволокли в тени. Я пришла в себя на грязной арене — против меня выставили какую-то когтистую тварь. Когда я сразила ее — еще одну. Я убивала их — одну за другой, а невидимые зрители требовали еще и еще!"

traits.locale_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

"My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

"My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

"My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

languages.text: “我的记忆背叛了我。当他们把我们拖进阴影之后，我很快就失去了知觉。我在一座肮脏的竞技场里醒来，他们放出了一只长着利爪的畜生对付我。我杀了它之后，他们又放出来一只。就这样，一只又一只，我把那些畜生全都杀了，可那些看不见的观众还觉得不够！不够！”
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: “我的记忆背叛了我。当他们把我们拖进阴影之后，我很快就失去了知觉。我在一座肮脏的竞技场里醒来，他们放出了一只长着利爪的畜生对付我。我杀了它之后，他们又放出来一只。就这样，一只又一只，我把那些畜生全都杀了，可那些看不见的观众还觉得不够！不够！”

languages.text: «Mi memoria me traiciona. Perdí el conocimiento al poco de que nos arrastraran a las sombras. Recuperé el conocimiento en una arena inmunda. Me habían enfrentado a una bestia con muchas garras. Cuando la maté, enviaron a otra. Acabé con todas, una tras otra, ¡pero los espectadores querían más!».
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi memoria me traiciona. Perdí el conocimiento al poco de que nos arrastraran a las sombras. Recuperé el conocimiento en una arena inmunda. Me habían enfrentado a una bestia con muchas garras. Cuando la maté, enviaron a otra. Acabé con todas, una tras otra, ¡pero los espectadores querían más!».

languages.text: 「記憶が定かではない。奴らに影に引きずり込まれた直後、私は意識を失った。気づくと汚らしい闘技場にいて――鋭い爪が目立つ獣と戦わせられた。一体倒すと、また一体送り込まれた。何度も何度も獣を倒し、見知らぬ観客はもっと、もっとと盛り上がった！」
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: 「記憶が定かではない。奴らに影に引きずり込まれた直後、私は意識を失った。気づくと汚らしい闘技場にいて――鋭い爪が目立つ獣と戦わせられた。一体倒すと、また一体送り込まれた。何度も何度も獣を倒し、見知らぬ観客はもっと、もっとと盛り上がった！」

languages.text: "Mein Gedächtnis lässt mich im Stich: Ich habe das Bewusstsein verloren, sobald sie uns in die Schatten gezerrt hatten. Ich kam in eine widerwärtige Arena, in der ein Untier mit Klauen wartete. Als ich es tötete, schickten sie ein weiteres. Ich tötete sie alle, eines nach dem anderen, und die unsichtbaren Zuschauer forderten mehr und mehr!"
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Gedächtnis lässt mich im Stich: Ich habe das Bewusstsein verloren, sobald sie uns in die Schatten gezerrt hatten. Ich kam in eine widerwärtige Arena, in der ein Untier mit Klauen wartete. Als ich es tötete, schickten sie ein weiteres. Ich tötete sie alle, eines nach dem anderen, und die unsichtbaren Zuschauer forderten mehr und mehr!"

languages.text: « Ma mémoire me trahit : j'ai perdu connaissance lorsqu'ils nous ont entraînés dans les ténèbres. Je suis revenue à moi dans une arène pestilentielle, face à une créature griffue n'attendant que de m'attaquer. Je l'ai tuée, mais ils en ont envoyé une autre, et encore une autre, que j'ai toutes abattues tandis que les spectateurs invisibles en réclamaient toujours plus ! »
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: « Ma mémoire me trahit : j'ai perdu connaissance lorsqu'ils nous ont entraînés dans les ténèbres. Je suis revenue à moi dans une arène pestilentielle, face à une créature griffue n'attendant que de m'attaquer. Je l'ai tuée, mais ils en ont envoyé une autre, et encore une autre, que j'ai toutes abattues tandis que les spectateurs invisibles en réclamaient toujours plus ! »

languages.text: "Çok bir şey hatırlamıyorum: Bizi gölgelere çekmelerinin hemen ardından bilincimi yitirmiştim. İğrenç bir arenada kendime geldim... Rakip olarak karşıma pençeli bir yaratık koymuşlardı. Yaratığın leşini serince bir başkasını gönderdiler. Hepsini birer birer geberttikçe, gözle göremediğim seyirciler daha fazlasını talep edip durdu!"
languages.original_text: "My memory betrays me: I lost consciousness soon after they dragged us into the shadows. I came to in a filthy arena — they had set some clawed beast against me. When I slew it, they sent another. I killed them all, one after another, and the unseen spectators demanded more and more!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok bir şey hatırlamıyorum: Bizi gölgelere çekmelerinin hemen ardından bilincimi yitirmiştim. İğrenç bir arenada kendime geldim... Rakip olarak karşıma pençeli bir yaratık koymuşlardı. Yaratığın leşini serince bir başkasını gönderdiler. Hepsini birer birer geberttikçe, gözle göremediğim seyirciler daha fazlasını talep edip durdu!"
